mapper.select: select class_name className, class_intro classIntro, class_price classPrice, class_image classImage, class_name_address classAddress from wish_class, class where wish_class.class_no = class.class_no and wish_class.user_no = 1;

select company_image companyImage, company_name companyName, wish_company.company_no companyNo from wish_company, company where wish_company.company_no = company.company_no and wish_company.user_no = 1;
